Sunrise Detox provides a safe, comfortable, and medically supervised path to recovery from alcohol and drug dependence. Our compassionate team offers round-the-clock care, ensuring a secure and supportive environment for your healing journey.

Your Personalized Treatment Planning Starts Here

We see your recovery as a journey, not a destination. Our goal is to safely transition you from detox to long-term sobriety, starting with a comprehensive plan built just for you.

  • Comprehensive Assessment: Every recovery journey begins with a thorough medical and psychological evaluation. We identify your specific needs, substance history, and any co-occurring disorders to craft an individualized care plan.
  • Medically-Supervised Stabilization: The detox phase is managed by licensed medical professionals who utilize evidence-based protocols and medications to minimize discomfort and ensure a safe withdrawal process.
  • Creating a Continuum of Care: Detox is only the first step. Before you leave, our specialists work with you to secure placement in a long-term treatment facility, ensuring a seamless transition and sustained sobriety.
Call Us Now

Send Us a Confidential Message

By submitting this form, you consent to be contacted by Sunrise Detox at the email address and/or phone number provided, including by phone call or text message. You also agree to receive email communications from us. Consent is not a condition of purchase.

Need Help Now?

Don't let cost or insurance confusion stop you. We accept most major insurance, are in-network with many plans, and offer self-pay options. Our team will personally work with your provider to maximize your coverage.

If we aren't the right fit, we will personally call other providers to find the care you need. Your recovery is our only goal.

Call 866-989-4252 For Immediate Help

Insurance Accepted at Sunrise Detox

Are the services from Sunrise Detox Center covered by your insurance? While we are in-network with most insurance plans, refer to this guide to find more information about your provider. Don’t find your insurer, or have further insurance questions? Call 866-750-8588, and we’ll be glad to find you answers. We’re ready to talk at all hours, every day of the week.

Medical Disclaimer

Descriptions and reports on products or services mentioned on this website should not be considered endorsements nor recommendations. If you have a medical emergency, call 911 or a doctor immediately. If you have concerns about suicide, please call the National Hotline at 1-800-273-8255.
